product_name: Bronze Plaque - Black - Lugs with Studs
ml_tags: OF CALVIN STEPHEN D’VAZ  Our Heartfelt Prayer Our Darling Son Calvin When we think of you each day With Gods help ease our journey  Guide us along our way May God keep you safetly in His arms Till we meet again one day The things you used to say Our hearts are heavy and tears flow Almighty God, Our Creator We humbly Pray You accept Calvin’s soul  and Grant him Eternal Peace, Love and Joy  In Your Heavenly Kingdom We thank You for the Gift  Of each moment of his Life Please mend our broken hearts PRECIOUS SON OF DEREK & ALBERTINA, LOVING BROTHER OF MICHELLE REST IN PEACE IN LOVING MEMORY  We miss your smile your joking ways Amen 10th January 2000 – 1st Feburary 2023
